de.erichseifert.gral.plots.settings

Class BasicSettingsStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.settings.BasicSettingsStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SettingsStorage, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractAreaRenderer, AbstractAxisRenderer2D, AbstractLineRenderer2D, AbstractPointRenderer

    public class BasicSettingsStorage
extends Object
implements SettingsStorage, Serializable
    Class that stores a specific and a default setting for a certain key. It provides support for class which register as a listener to listen for setting changes.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BasicSettingsStorage()
      Initializes an empty storage.

      • hasSetting

        public boolean hasSetting(Key key)
        Returns true if there is a setting for the specified key.
        Parameters:
        key - Key of the setting.
        Returns:
        true if the key has a setting, false otherwise.

      • getSetting

        public <T> T getSetting(Key key)
        Returns the setting with the specified key. If no setting is available, the default setting will be returned.
        Specified by:
        getSetting in interface SettingsStorage
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of setting.
        Parameters:
        key - Key.
        Returns:
        Setting.

      • setSetting

        protected <T> void setSetting(Key key,
                  T value,
                  boolean isDefault)
        Sets the setting or default setting with the specified key to a new value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of setting.
        Parameters:
        key - Key.
        value - Value to be set.
        isDefault - true when the value should be the default, otherwise false

      • addSettingsListener

        public void addSettingsListener(SettingsListener l)
        Adds a new listener which gets notified if settings have changed.
        Parameters:

      • notifySettingChanged

        protected void notifySettingChanged(Key key,
                        Object valueOld,
                        Object valueNew,
                        boolean defaultSetting)
        Invokes the settingChanged method on all registered listeners.
        Parameters:
        key - Key.
        valueOld - Old value.
        valueNew - New value.
        defaultSetting - true if a default setting has changed, false otherwise.
